text: Alasanne Ates Diouf (born 24 March 2000) is a Senegalese footballer who plays for Austin Bold in USL Championship. == Career == === SIMA === Diouf was spotted by SIMA Águilas head coach Mike Potempa in Dakar while playing as part of former Senegal international midfielder Salif Diao's Sport4Charity foundation and invited to move to America and enroll at the academy. === Orlando City B === In 2019, Diouf was signed to Orlando City B ahead of their inaugural USL League One season. On 30 March 2019, Diouf made his debut for Orlando City B in a 1–3 loss against FC Tucson. Diouf played the entire match. He scored his first goal for the team on April 14, 2019, in a 1–1 draw against South Georgia Tormenta. === Austin Bold === On 21 April 2020, Diouf signed for USL Championship team Austin Bold having spent preseason on trial with the club although USL had already temporarily suspended play due to the COVID-19 pandemic in March. He scored his first goal for the club on August 8, 2020, in the 38' of a 4–1 home victory against RGV Toros. == References == == External links == * * Alasanne Ates Diouf at U.S. Soccer Development Academy Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Senegalese expatriate footballers Category:Senegalese expatriates in the United States Category:Association football forwards Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Montverde Academy alumni Category:Orlando City B players Category:Austin Bold FC players Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:USL League One players Category:USL Championship players Category:Sportspeople from Dakar
title: Ates Diouf
